mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Crew( crew_id, member_id, crew_name, crew_goal, crew_title, crew_location, crew_sport, crew_gender, crew_frequency, crew_age, crew_date ) VALUES ( #{crew_id}, #{member_id}, #{crew_name}, #{crew_goal}, #{crew_title}, #{crew_location}, #{crew_sport}, #{crew_gender}, #{crew_frequency}, #{crew_age}, #{crew_date} );
INSERT INTO CrewMember(crew_id, member_id, crew_member_state, battle_wins) VALUES(#{crew_id}, #{member_id},#{crew_member_state},#{battle_wins});
mapper.update: UPDATE Crew SET crew_name = #{crew_name}, crew_goal = #{crew_goal}, crew_title = #{crew_title}, crew_location = #{crew_location}, crew_sport = #{crew_sport}, crew_gender = #{crew_gender}, crew_frequency = #{crew_frequency}, crew_age = #{crew_age} WHERE crew_id = #{crew_id};
